review: this thing rocks! It works so nicely and it does so much more than I thought it would.Pros:I love screen mirroring, and how you can play a movie from your phone onto your tv, and set it up so that you can leave the Videos app or lock your phone, and the iPhone knows to keep playing the movie on the tv, and not interrupt the movie for everyone watching. I love the custom remote control setup (along with how well the IR sensor picks up the signal from the remote, regardless of how out-of-sight you put the unit itself), I love the Bluetooth keyboard compatibility, I love the Netflix app in it, I love how well the media player and device synchronisation work together so seamlessly. I especially love how I can set up a photo stream on my iPhone that's just for pictures that I'd like to see in a screensaver, and set that particular stream as the screensaver for the Apple TV.Cons:The Netflix app needs a better UI, as I get annoyed with navigating from the menu Netflix > User Selection > Recently Watched > (name of show) > (next episode in the series that I need to watch) > click "Play" > then select from "Resume Playback" or "Start From Beginning". That's slightly fatiguing. Even still tho, I really like using this thing for Netflix.But I really do love this thing. I would easily recommend it to my friends. In fact I already have.Easily one of the best purchases I've ever made.

review: Honestly, if you want to ditch cable and pay extra for the premium services on this device go for it. Otherwise this thing doesn't even properly work. I purchased this before the chromecast release so that I could stream movies from my Macbook to my TV. Instead what this does is require about an hour worth of waiting to get a movie to load from my mac to this device, and it never mirrors my screen correctly. This thing is a $100 box that lets you pay a premium for their services, and mirroring doesn't even work right.
